template.template_analysis: The faangpath_simple template is well-suited for candidates aiming for a clean and professional look. It offers a simple yet elegant design that can highlight key qualifications effectively.
template.customization_options: Key customization options for this template include adjusting the color scheme to match the company's branding, adding a skills section to showcase technical expertise, and incorporating a summary section at the beginning for a strong first impression.

detected_fields.ai_field_analysis: To effectively use the detected fields, replace the placeholders with actual candidate information, ensure consistency in formatting for addresses, and consider adding additional contact details like phone numbers and email addresses.

candidate_data.name: Maciej Kasik
candidate_data.profile_summary: Motivated Computer Science graduate with a strong foundation in programming and problem-solving, seeking an entry-level Software Engineer position to apply and expand my skills in a professional environment.

Education requirements.field: Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field

Key responsibilities: Designing, developing, and maintaining secure and scalable data pipelines using medallion architecture
Migrating SQL Server to Snowflake on AWS Cloud
Implementing medallion architecture (bronze, silver, and gold layers)
Company values/culture mentions: Real impact on the technological direction
Building a better world through financial inclusion
Certifications or qualifications: Certifications in Snowflake, AWS, or other cloud platforms
Exact phrases for CV: Hands-on experience with Snowflake, SQL, AWS, ETL, and data pipeline design
Proven success in migrating SQL Server to the cloud, ensuring data integrity and performance
Skilled in bronze, silver, and gold layers, ensuring data reliability, scalability, and accessibility
Experience in query optimization, data modeling, and system performance tuning
Knowledge of encryption, access control, and regulatory compliance for cloud-based systems
Ability to translate technical concepts into business insights, working effectively with architects, analysts, and leadership
Anticipates challenges, removes obstacles, and creates scalable long-term solutions

weaknesses: Lack of specific technical skills like Snowflake, ETL, and AI
improvement_suggestions: Consider gaining certifications in Snowflake, AWS, or relevant cloud platforms
Highlight any projects or coursework related to data engineering or cloud technologies
Emphasize problem-solving and collaboration skills in the profile summary

job_analysis.template_specific_recommendations: To align the candidate's profile with the job requirements using the faangpath_simple template, focus on customizing the skills section to include relevant technical skills like SQL, data engineering, and performance tuning. Additionally, consider adding a section highlighting any hands-on experience with cloud technologies and data optimization projects.
